interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/10/30 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Producers': ['Casanova Media'], 'Starring': ['Alessio Boni', 'Sergio Rubini', 'Thomas Trabacchi'], 'Studio': ['Acorn TV']} Review Text: I loved this show and I hope you will make a Season 2. All the Actors are wonderful and I can see this continue as the children marry.
I read the captions since I speak only English but as you read it’s like you understand them. It’s one of the best shows I’ve seen on Acorn since A Place to Call Home. Review Title: Wonderful Show Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
